text: Bale ya'o -- ''tomara amadera jan'ya duti kalyanera kono ekati chara ara kisera pratiksa karate paro? Ara amara tomadera jan'ya pratiksa karachi ye allah tomadera sasti hanabena tamra tarapha theke athaba amadera hate. Ata'eba pratiksa karo, amara'o abasya'i tomadera sathe pratiksamana.â€™â€™
